subcontracting.title: Subcontracting
subcontracting.description: Information about the subcontracted portion of the contract.

hasSubcontracting.title: Subcontracting used
hasSubcontracting.description: Whether the contract is subcontracted or not.

Subcontracting.title: Subcontracting
Subcontracting.description: Information about the subcontracted portion of the contract.

details.title: Subcontracting details
details.description: Details on the subcontracted portion of the contract.

maximumPercentage.title: Maximum percentage of subcontracted value
maximumPercentage.description: The maximum percentage of the contract value that is subcontracted.

minimumPercentage.title: Minimum percentage of subcontracted value
minimumPercentage.description: The minimum percentage of the contract value that is subcontracted.

competitiveMaximumPercentage.title: Maximum percentage of total value for competitive subcontracting
competitiveMaximumPercentage.description: Maximum percentage of the contract value required to be subcontracted through a competitive procedure.

competitiveMinimumPercentage.title: Minimum percentage of total value for competitive subcontracting
competitiveMinimumPercentage.description: Minimum percentage of the contract value required to be subcontracted through a competitive procedure.

value.title: Subcontracted value
value.description: The VAT-free value of the subcontracted portion of the contract.

competitive.title: Competitive subcontracting
competitive.description: Whether the contract will be subcontracted through a competitive procedure.
